A Little House Traveler: Writings from Laura Ingalls Wilder’s Journeys Across America
1:
--------------------
Text: A Little House Traveler:  It consists of three parts: "On the Way Home", a diary originally published in 1962; "West from Home", a collection of letters from Wilder to her husband Almanzo Wilder written in 1915 and published in 1974; and "The Road Back", a previously unpublished diary.
